extendedInfo.description: TRIAL for number ONE nutrition eating out app in the Store : Fast Food Calorie Watchers ! A must have for diet watchers if you are on the Food Score system (old and new-both included) !Plus this app also points you towards healthier choices while dining out.ONLY FIRST SEVEN RESTAURANTS are working in trial , lite version.It is designed for you to see what full version is all about.App provides you with nutrition info: calories, Food Score,old Food Score, carbs, fat, protein, sodium of food items of over 300 (full version) most popular restaurants and fast food chains from US, Canada and UK. Even popular buffets are included!=>There are over 300 restaurants plus even buffets. This is the ONLY app with such great database and updated menus in the Store=>Menus are being updated regularly, so you are provided most current information. =>No points counter or calculator needed - food score and classic food score  already calculated for you =>Full version is 5 MB in size - less than half the size of some similar apps = less memory used on your phone/tablet=>No Internet or calculator required! All info is stored in your phone or tablet - access it anytime, anywhere =>In addition please find all major Movie Theaters Popcorn, Snacks and Drinks calories. =>Screen is re-sizable, so you can make it small or large with movement of you fingertips in case you need larger size letters. =>Search Restaurants- search box is included to find restaurants easy =>Watch yourself lose weight when using portion control______________________________Units = Food ScoreClassic Units = Old Food Score______________________________âââââSo many restaurants listed! The menus look pretty complete as well. Nice that you don't need Internet connection for it to work - you can check items before ordering even in places without wi-fi.âââââI use it before going out to be prepared for what I know will be a healthy meal! I would recommend.âââââBest money I've spent for any appâââââLose weight while also dining out made simple for watchers of many type of diets thanks to this app. Diet watchers can also check what included restaurants are currently offering. The app points you towards healthier dining out experience and making lose weight more successful.

reviews.title: Seriously
reviews.comment: Took forever to load and I couldn\'t even find plain french toast on ihop menu! I would like my money back!
reviews.author: Wendy Szika

reviews.comment: Awesome! But you have to buy full version to be able to use all restaurants
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: don\'t download this piece of crap app you only get to view 10 restaurants I\'ve never even heard of except for Arbys
reviews.author: josh montgomery

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Searched for sonic which it found but wouldn\'t let me view unless I bought full version... if it wasn\'t available in the free version it shouldn\'t be in there to trick you :(
reviews.author: Heather bickmore

reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: Wide variety of restaurants. Updated menus.  Totally worth it.
reviews.author: Saundra Honeycutt
